title: The Tinners' Way
description: The third book in The Lyonesse Stone trilogy.An ancient prophecy foretells disaster, and only Penny, John, and Ben Trevelyan can prevent it happening.They have survived the dark, magical trials of the Lyonesse Stone and the Seat of Storms. Now their attempt to defend Cornwall from this looming threat leads them again on quests through other worlds and times. Can they succeed?They are faced with the evil forces of the sinister Doctor Dee, the mystery of the man from the sea, and a much-feared face from their own past, and they have only a few friends to lend them aid.Ruthless pirates; the giant of St Michael's Mount; mystic sea caves; treasure in the Isles of Scilly; the ancient dolmens of West Cornwall; the Sea Bucca; the monstrous Morgawr and lowly Piskey; the lonely vale of a long-ago battlefield: all these and more evoke the fear, courage, adventure and sacrifice of the Tinners' Way.
author: Craig Weatherhill
